# STATS::STAT_GET_STRING

## Summary
Get the value of an String stat

## Parameters
* **STATSENUM** keyHash
* **INT** player = -1

## Returns
* **STRING**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p1 is always -1 in the script files
